statements: UPDATE designer_profiles SET age = 30, nationality = 'American' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET past_work = 'Worked on multiple design projects' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET description='Passionate designer with a creative vision', age=30 WHERE id=1
UPDATE designer_profiles SET nationality='French', portfolio_url='http://example.com/portfolio', past_work='Extensive experience in interior design' WHERE name='Alice'
UPDATE designer_profiles SET designer_name = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE designer_portfolios SET project_name = 'New Project', project_description = 'This is a new project', project_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE designer_id = 2;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET contact_email='new@email.com', designer_name='John Doe' WHERE designer_id=1;
UPDATE designer_portfolios SET project_name='New Project', project_description='A detailed description of the new project', project_date='2023-01-15' WHERE designer_id=4;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE designer_portfolios SET portfolio_name='New Collection', creation_date='2022-03-15' WHERE designer_id=2;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE designer_past_work SET description = 'Award-winning project with unique design elements', year_completed = 2020 WHERE designer_id = 2 AND work_name LIKE '%Project%';
UPDATE designer_profiles SET designer_name='John Doe', designer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE designer_id=1;
UPDATE designer_past_work SET work_title='New Collection', work_image_url='image-url' WHERE designer_id=2;
UPDATE designer_profiles SET designer_name = 'John Doe', designer_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE designer_portfolios SET portfolio_title = 'New Collection Showcase', portfolio_description = 'A collection inspired by nature and sustainability.' WHERE portfolio_id = 5;
UPDATE DesignerProfiles SET designer_name = 'John Doe', designer_age = 30 WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE DesignerPortfolios SET portfolio_description = 'New portfolio description', portfolio_images = 5 WHERE designer_id = 2;
UPDATE DesignerProfiles SET designer_age = 35, designer_bio = 'Passionate about innovative designs' WHERE designer_id = 101;
UPDATE DesignerPortfolios SET portfolio_description = 'A collection of modern designs', portfolio_images = 20 WHERE designer_id = 101;
